content.text: Personal preparedness is about having a few simple things ready so you're not scrambling when something happens.
Save Pete and Dave's phone numbers where you can access them even if systems are down. Consider labeling them as "ClearTriage Pete" and "ClearTriage Dave" for quick access during incidents.

content.title: Authentication Backup
content.text: If you use a YubiKey, keep your backup somewhere accessible but secure. Test it occasionally. For other MFA methods, ensure your backup codes are saved securely.
Know how to report incidents when digital channels are down - Pete's phone is your best bet for urgent security issues. Document what happened (even on paper) so you can provide details later.
When in doubt, overcommunicate. Better to call Pete about something that turns out to be nothing than to sit on a potential incident.
